comments: Brown (LAC) lowers his arm across Lofton Jr.'s (UTA) right elbow during his shot attempt and the contact is more than marginal.
Lofton Jr. (UTA) establishes himself in a wide screening position in Hyland's (LAC) path, but the contact is absorbed to his front.
Hyland (LAC) briefly grasps George's (UTA) arm and immediately releases.
Hyland (LAC) reaches in and any contact with Lofton Jr.'s (UTA) wrist during his drive to the basket is marginal.
Lofton Jr. (UTA) extends his off-arm into Theis (LAC), affecting his ability to contest the shot attempt.
Brown (LAC) establishes himself in Horton-Tucker's (UTA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Lofton Jr. (UTA) moves alongside Boston Jr.'s (LAC) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
George (UTA) fumbles the ball after bringing both hands to the ball and legally recovers it.
Hendricks (UTA) puts his hand through the bottom of the basket before making contact with the ball.
Moon (LAC) contests the jump shot attempt and avoids making contact with George's (UTA) arm.
Lofton Jr. (UTA) makes contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Boston Jr. (LAC) prior to incidental arm contact occurring.
